case.originalMessage: We noticed a new sign-in to your Google Account on a Windows device. If this was you, you do not need to do anything. If not, we will help you secure your account. Check activity. You can also see security activity at https://myaccount.google.com/notifications. You received this email to let you know about important changes to your Google Account and services.

Standard security notification: new sign-in alert
No financial demands or credential requests (legitimate indicator)
analysis.explanation: This email message appears to be a legitimate notification. Our analysis detected 8 legitimacy signal(s) including official domain references, standard notification language, and non-coercive tone. The message does not request sensitive information or financial payments. This appears safe, but always verify by logging in directly to the official website rather than clicking links in emails.
analysis.suggestedReply: Thank you for your message. I will verify this through official channels before taking any action.
actionSteps: Verify sender identity through official channels
Do not share sensitive information with unknown contacts
Trust your instincts â if something feels wrong, it probably is

& Relevant Sections of Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS)

1. COMPLAINANT DETAILS:

2. NATURE OF COMPLAINT:
   Category: Legitimate Notification
   Communication Medium: EMAIL
   Risk Level: LOW
   AI Confidence Score: 0%

3. DETAILED DESCRIPTION:
   The complainant received a suspicious email communication
   identified as a potential Legitimate Notification.
   
   Suspicious Patterns Detected:
   1. Legitimate domain reference: google.com
   2. Legitimate domain reference: myaccount.google.com
   3. Non-coercive language: "if this was you, don't need to do anything"
   4. Standard security notification: new sign-in alert
   5. Standard footer explanation
   6. Standard activity review prompt
   7. Non-threatening optional action
   8. No financial demands or credential requests (legitimate indicator)

4. ORIGINAL MESSAGE (EVIDENCE):

   We noticed a new sign-in to your Google Account on a Windows device. If this was you, you do not need to do anything. If not, we will help you secure your account. Check activity. You can also see security activity at https://myaccount.google.com/notifications. You received this email to let you know about important changes to your Google Account and services.
   """

5. FINANCIAL RISK ASSESSMENT:

6. RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
   1. Verify sender identity through official channels

   3. If suspicious, report at cybercrime.gov.in
   4. Trust your instincts â if something feels wrong, it probably is

7. DECLARATION:
